import React, { Component } from 'react' import GameService from '../../../service/game.service' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import './GameDetails.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' class GameDetails extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = {} this.gameService = new GameService() } getGamesInfo() { const id = this.props.match.params.gameId this.gameService.getGame(id) .then(response => this.setState(response.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } componentDidMount = () => { this.getGameInfo() } render() { return (

YAY!

{this.state.title}

Info

{this.state.description}

Detalles t√©cnicos

  • Longitud: {this.state.length}
  • Inversiones: {this.state.inversions}
 Volver ) } } export default GameDetails
